mapper.select: select ta.inquiry_number from tbl_alarm ta join tbl_inquiry ti on ta.inquiry_number =ti.inquiry_number where ti.user_number = 2 and ti.inquiry_status ='complete'

select user_nickname, board_number, board_title, board_category, board_way, board_recruit_number, board_start_date, board_date, board_period, board_views, board_company from tbl_board b join tbl_user u on b.user_number = u.user_number where board_status = 'open' order by board_start_date
